General.Name: Sichuan Huiyuan Optical Com
General.Description: Sichuan Huiyuan Optical Communication Co., Ltd. produces and sells optical fiber cables in China. It offers ordinary optical cable, miniature fiber optic cable, power fiber optic cable, and indoor fiber optic cable. Sichuan Huiyuan Optical Communication Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: National Hi-Tech Development Westen Zone, Chengdu, China, 610091
